::Zardus::

Zardus taps his comm, replying to Shockaract. "Can you go to the CF 
and attack any Predacons present? We're temporarily going to help out 
the Maximals, at least save them from extinction this time."

He then turns back to the console he was in, tapping a few more keys. 
He was trying to make the room that was being jammed monitorable 
again. Zardus's hands fly over the keyboard as he enters command 
after command, reminding him of when he had first landed on earth 
under the Predacon banner. He almost exclaims in triumph as the 
monitoring systems in the room activate, clearly showing Unitron, 
Firestarter, Sixshot, Ares, Serpentor, Double Punch, Injector, 
Manterror, and Bumblebee and playing back whatever they were saying. 
Zardus doubted that the bots would notice that the monitoring systems 
were back online, so he simply sat back, listening. No one was going 
to keep anything from him in his own base.

Zardus leans forward and taps a few keys. Every blast door in the 
area that the planners were in closes and locks, and the 
neutrodestructive gas releasers prepare to kill..

(KSL, please post whatever Unitron and co are saying or tell me over 
IM).




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Shokaract was still outside of the base, and he was watching 
everyone leave.
> He calls Zardus.
> 
> Shokaract: Hey, leader, where is everyone going? Should we be going 
with
> them?
> 
> Kracken: Ask him what our mission is.
> 
> Shokaract: Fine. What's everyone leaving to do, also?
> 
> Kracken: Ask him who we're fighting.
> 
> Shokaract doesn't ask.
> 
> Kracken: Hmm. Sometimes, it can be quite difficult to make your 
leaders get
> annoyed...
